backend

Class PollyObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.PollyObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorfulObject

    public abstract class PollyObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The most basic form of all objects that get added to slides (Back and White)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PollyObject

        public PollyObject(processing.core.PApplet sketch,
                   float x,
                   float y)
        Constructor for PollyObject
        Parameters:
        sketch - A reference to a PApplet to allow general functionality of the processing library
        x - A float to represent the initial x starting position (in pixels) of the object, should be a slide-relative coordinate
        y - A float to represent the initial y starting position (in pixels) of the object, should be a slide-relative coordinate

        Function used during the serialization process to restore transient processing library-related variables
        Parameters:
        sketch - a reference to a PApplet to allow general functionality of the processing library

      • getPosition

        protected float[] getPosition()
        Get the current xy position of the object
        Returns:
        The current xy position of the oject in slide-relative coordinates

      • setPosition

        protected void setPosition(float x,
                           float y)
        Set xy position of the object
        Parameters:
        x - The current x position of the oject in slide-relative coordinates
        y - The current y position of the oject in slide-relative coordinates

      • setRotate

        protected void setRotate(float r)
        Set raw rotation angle of the object
        Parameters:
        r - The desired raw rotation angle in degrees (from the original rotation NOT relative from current rotation)

      • setRelativeRotate

        protected void setRelativeRotate(float r)
        Set relative angle change in rotation of the object
        Parameters:
        r - The desired raw rotation angle in degrees (from the original rotation NOT relative from current rotation)

      • getDimensions

        protected float[] getDimensions()
        Get the current dimension and position of the object
        Returns:
        The current xy position of the oject in slide-relative coordinates followed by the width and height, respecively (both in pixels)

      • withinScope

        protected boolean withinScope(float x,
                              float y)
        Checks if the mouse is over the object (accounts for rotation and translation)
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the mouse in slide-relative coordinates
        y - The y position of the mouse in slide-relative coordinates
        Returns:
        Whether or not the mouse is over the object

      • showBoundingBox

        protected void showBoundingBox()
        Draws an orange rectangle representing the selection field of the object.

      • getBoundingBoxPoints

        protected processing.core.PVector[] getBoundingBoxPoints(float xcenter,
                                                         float ycenter)
        Generate four points representing the verticies of the rectangular selection field (Does not account for rotation)
        Parameters:
        xcenter - The x position representing the center of rotation (in slide-relative coordinates)
        ycenter - The y position representing the center of rotation (in slide-relative coordinates)
        Returns:
        Array of the vertex positions in slide-relative coordinates

      • getRotatedBoundingBoxPoints

        protected processing.core.PVector[] getRotatedBoundingBoxPoints(float xcenter,
                                                                float ycenter)
        Generate four points representing the verticies of the rectangular selection field (Accounts for rotation)
        Parameters:
        xcenter - The x position representing the center of rotation (in slide-relative coordinates)
        ycenter - The y position representing the center of rotation (in slide-relative coordinates)
        Returns:
        Array of the vertex positions in slide-relative coordinates

      • rotateAbout

        protected processing.core.PVector rotateAbout(processing.core.PVector rotatePoint,
                                              processing.core.PVector anchor,
                                              float degrees)
        Calculate the new position of a rotated point
        Parameters:
        rotatePoint - The point being rotated (in slide-relative coordinates)
        anchor - The point to rotate about (in slide-relative coordinates)
        degrees - The desired rotation amount in degrees
        Returns:
        The new xy position in slide-relative coordinates

      • display

        protected void display()
        Template to draw an object to the slide

      • pan

        protected void pan(float xo,
                   float yo)
        Move the object (Accounts for any zoom factor)
        Parameters:
        xo - Relative amount to move the object in the x dimension (in slide-related pixel amounts)
        yo - Relative amount to move the object in the y dimension (in slide-related pixel amounts)

      • resize

        protected void resize(float factor)
        Alter the size of the object from its center. If any change should decrease the zoom below 10%, it is set to 10% instead. Objectstarts at 100%
        Parameters:
        factor - The amount to scale the object (in percentage) from the current size
